data.name: LinguServiceEvent
desc: This type of event may be broadcast by a spell checker or hyphenator service implementation to inform its listeners (clients) that the results of previous function calls may be different now. It is possible to suggest that hyphenation should be done again and/or the spelling of previously incorrect or correct words should be checked again.

items.name: nEvent
lines: The value may be combined via logical OR from those values defined in com.sun.star.linguistic2.LinguServiceEventFlags
